item.title: Starting a Blog in 2020
item.description: The aim here is to become a better writer through practice. Although it sounds somewhat outdated, I can’t think of a better alternative to get into the habit of writing. The format of a blog gives me the opportunity to create long-form writing with the added self-imposed pressure of having to publish. Rachel Thomas of Fast.ai wrote an excellent article on the benefits of writing a blog, covering things you can gain from writing a blog, which I won’t rehash here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Data Science lead, based in Berlin, with experience across industries and problem spaces. You can find further details on my LinkedIn profile. I’m involved in these projects: A GIVEN B, a collaborative initiative aiming to bridge the gap between data science and design folks to improve how we work together. Hot Concept Music, a new digital-only electronic and alternative music label. NoNRG, an ambient music mix series with sporadic activity.
